name: NamSor-API
description: NamSor sorts names. Names are meaningful : we use sociolinguistics to extract their semantics and deliver actionable intelligence. We use applied onomastics recognizes the linguistic or cultural origin of personal names in any alphabet / language, with fine grain and high accuracy - and infer gender.

apis.name: NamSor Gender API
apis.description:
GendRE is an Application Programming Interface (API) to determine the gender of a personal name on a -1 (Male) to +1 (Female) scale, for a given geography/locale or globally.

The API automatically recognizes which culture to apply when assessing the gender of a personal name. Some examples: “Andrea Rossini” is most likely an Italian name and a male name, whereas “Andrea Parker” is most likely an anglosaxon name and a female name; 声涛周 is most likely male ; “O. Sokolova” is most likely female.

The API comes as a free version (name by name) or freemium version (bath processing, 1000 names at a time).
